many a time in life - you look around for people but seem there's no one, but when you really think deep down your heart you realized that we are made for each other.
;Having prepared beautiful gardens, created animals of all sorts God created man. God noticed that the man was lonely. God said; it's not good for man to be alone Gen. 2:18 then He decided to made him a 'help meet' hence the woman was made out of man to help him. YOU CAN BE FULFILLED ALONE: there is someone out there you can lean on- go for it now!
